name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
description: Premium noise-cancelling wireless headphones with 30-hour battery life, comfortable over-ear design, and crystal-clear sound quality. Perfect for music lovers and professionals.

name: Smart Fitness Watch
description: Advanced fitness tracking watch with heart rate monitor, GPS, sleep tracking, and 7-day battery life. Water-resistant design perfect for workouts and daily wear.

name: Organic Cotton T-Shirt
description: Comfortable 100% organic cotton t-shirt, available in multiple colors. Sustainable and eco-friendly, perfect for everyday wear. Machine washable.

name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
description: Insulated stainless steel water bottle keeps drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours. BPA-free, leak-proof design with easy-carry handle.

name: Laptop Stand Adjustable
description: Ergonomic aluminum laptop stand with adjustable height and angle. Improves posture and reduces neck strain. Fits laptops up to 17 inches.

name: Running Shoes
description: Lightweight running shoes with cushioned sole and breathable mesh upper. Perfect for jogging, walking, and gym workouts. Available in multiple sizes.

name: Wireless Charging Pad
description: Fast wireless charging pad compatible with all Qi-enabled devices. Sleek design with LED indicator. Charges phones, earbuds, and smartwatches.

name: Backpack with USB Port
description: Durable backpack with built-in USB charging port, multiple compartments, and padded laptop sleeve. Perfect for students and professionals.
